8.7 The FILE-SYSTEM module

file-exists?

Function

Summary

Returns #t if the specified file exists.

Signature

file-exists? file => exists?

Arguments

file
An instance of <pathname>.

Values

exists?
An instance of <boolean>.

Library

system

Module

file-system

Description

Returns #t if file exists. If it refers to a link, the target of the link is checked.

System and I/O Reference - 31 MAR 2000
